items.name: Contract_Duration
items.label: مدت قرارداد [روز]
items.validateMessage:
تعداد روز بايستي كمتر از 10 هزار روز باشد . 
فقط ورود عدد مجاز است !

columns.name: Subject_Code
columns.label: انتخاب موضوع
columns.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, 'موضوع قرارداد را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT Subject_Code, CONCAT (Subject_Code," || ",Subject_Title)
FROM PMT_TB110006
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'
 and Subject_Title LIKE "%@#Subject_Search%"
columns.title: انتخاب موضوع

columns.name: Subject_Title
columns.label: عنوان موضوع
columns.sql:
SELECT Subject_Title
FROM PMT_TB110006
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'
 and Subject_Code = "@#Subject_Code"
columns.title: عنوان موضوع

items.name: Contract_Counter
items.label: شمارنده قرارداد
items.sql:
SELECT COUNT(ID)
FROM PMT_TB110001
WHERE IsDelete = 0 AND IsActive = 1

columns.name: Supplier_Code
columns.label: انتخاب طرف قرارداد
columns.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, 'طرف قرارداد (تامين كننده) را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT Supplier_Code, CONCAT (Supplier_Code," || ",Supplier_Full_Title)
FROM PMT_TB110003
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and Supplier_Full_Title LIKE "%@#Suppliers_Search%"
columns.title: انتخاب طرف قرارداد

columns.name: Supplier_Full_Title
columns.label: عنوان طرف قرارداد
columns.sql:
SELECT Supplier_Full_Title
FROM PMT_TB110003
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and Supplier_Code = "@#Supplier_Code"
columns.title: عنوان طرف قرارداد

columns.name: System_Personal_Code
columns.label: انتخاب فرد
columns.sql:
SELECT NULL System_Personal_Code, 'فرد را انتخاب كنيد ...' System_Personal_Code

UNION

SELECT System_Personal_Code, CONCAT (System_Personal_Code," || ",First_Name," ",Last_Name)
FROM PMT_TB110005
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and concat(First_Name," ",Last_Name) LIKE "%@#Personnel_Search%"
columns.title: انتخاب فرد

columns.name: ORG_Job_Code
columns.label: انتخاب شغل
columns.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, 'شغل را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT ORG_Job_Code, CONCAT (ORG_Job_Code," || ",ORG_Job_Title)
FROM PMT_TB120014
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and System_Personal_Code = "@#System_Personal_Code"
columns.title: انتخاب شغل

columns.name: Personnel_Name
columns.label: نام و نام خانوادگي
columns.sql:
SELECT CONCAT (First_Name," ",Last_Name)
FROM PMT_TB110005
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and System_Personal_Code = "@#System_Personal_Code"
columns.title: نام و نام خانوادگي

columns.name: Job_Title
columns.label: عنوان شغل
columns.sql:
SELECT ORG_Job_Title
FROM PMT_TB120014
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and ORG_Job_Code = "@#ORG_Job_Code"
columns.title: عنوان شغل

columns.name: Project_Code
columns.label: انتخاب پروژه
columns.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, 'موضوع قرارداد را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT Project_Code, CONCAT (Project_Code," || ",Project_Title)
FROM PMT_TB110002
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and Project_Title LIKE "%@#Project_Search%"
columns.title: انتخاب پروژه

columns.name: Project_Title
columns.label: عنوان پروژه
columns.sql:
SELECT Project_Title
FROM PMT_TB110002
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and Project_Code = "@#Project_Code"
columns.title: عنوان پروژه

columns.name: Amount_Value
columns.label: مبلغ
columns.placeholder: عددي كمتر از 15 رقم وارد كنيد
columns.validateMessage: بايستي عددي كمنر از 15 رقم وارد شود!
columns.title: مبلغ

columns.name: Location_Code
columns.label: انتخاب محل فعاليت
columns.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, 'محل فعاليت را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT Location_Code, CONCAT (Location_Code," || ",Location_Title)
FROM PMT_TB100004
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and Location_Title LIKE "%@#Location_Search%"
columns.title: انتخاب محل فعاليت

columns.name: Location_Title
columns.label: عنوان محل فعاليت
columns.sql:
SELECT Location_Title
FROM PMT_TB100004
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and Location_Code = "@#Location_Code"
